description: Church of England says a decision not to allow an Irish inscription on a headstone can be appealed.
title: Irish epitaph row 'does not reflect church policy'
title_page: Irish epitaph row 'does not reflect church policy' - BBC News
maintext: In his judgement for the consistory court of the Diocese of Coventry on 6 May, Judge Stephen Eyre QC, found there was "a sad risk that the phrase would be regarded as some form of slogan" and would be "unintelligible to all but a small minority of readers".
